languages.text: "Да дайте уже ему сгинуть в своей Паутине и оставить нас и наш экипаж в покое..." {n}В голосе Абеляра звенит обманутая надежда.{/n}
"Oh, please let the xenos slink off to his Webway and leave us and our crew in peace..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да дайте уже ему сгинуть в своей Паутине и оставить нас и наш экипаж в покое..." {n}В голосе Абеляра звенит обманутая надежда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh, let the xenos shove off to his Webway already and leave us and our crew alone..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, let the xenos shove off to his Webway already and leave us and our crew alone..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, please let the xenos slink off to his Webway and leave us and our crew in peace..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, please let the xenos slink off to his Webway and leave us and our crew in peace..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, bitte lasst den Xenos in sein Netz der Tausend Tore davonschleichen, und lasst uns und unsere Crew in Frieden ..." {n}Tiefe Enttäuschung liegt in Abelards Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, please let the xenos slink off to his Webway and leave us and our crew in peace..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh, bitte lasst den Xenos in sein Netz der Tausend Tore davonschleichen, und lasst uns und unsere Crew in Frieden ..." {n}Tiefe Enttäuschung liegt in Abelards Stimme.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “噢，拜托，就让这个异形溜回他的网道里，别再打扰我们的船员了……”{n}阿贝拉德的声音中充满了失望。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, please let the xenos slink off to his Webway and leave us and our crew in peace..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，拜托，就让这个异形溜回他的网道里，别再打扰我们的船员了……”{n}阿贝拉德的声音中充满了失望。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, s'il vous plaît, laissez le xénos retourner dans sa maudite Toile, que nous soyons enfin tranquilles... » {n}Abélard ne cache pas sa déception.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, please let the xenos slink off to his Webway and leave us and our crew in peace..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh, s'il vous plaît, laissez le xénos retourner dans sa maudite Toile, que nous soyons enfin tranquilles... » {n}Abélard ne cache pas sa déception.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Por favor, que el xenos se vuelva a la Telaraña y nos deje a nosotros y a la tripulación en paz...». {n}La voz de Abelard está llena de decepción.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, please let the xenos slink off to his Webway and leave us and our crew in peace..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por favor, que el xenos se vuelva a la Telaraña y nos deje a nosotros y a la tripulación en paz...». {n}La voz de Abelard está llena de decepción.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「その異種族が網辻へこそこそと逃げるのをお見逃しください。そしてどうか、我々とクルーの平穏をお守りください…」{n}アベラルドの声のには落胆の響きがあった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, please let the xenos slink off to his Webway and leave us and our crew in peace..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その異種族が網辻へこそこそと逃げるのをお見逃しください。そしてどうか、我々とクルーの平穏をお守りください…」{n}アベラルドの声のには落胆の響きがあった。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Şu zeno basıp Ağyol'una gitsin, bizi ve mürettebatımızı rahat bıraksın lütfen." {n}Hayal kırıklığı, Abelard'ın sesine yansıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, please let the xenos slink off to his Webway and leave us and our crew in peace..." {n}Abelard's voice rings with disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah, zeno basıp Ağyol'una gitsin ve bizi ve mürettebatımızı rahat bıraksın lütfen." {n}Abelard'ın sesi hayal kırıklığı dolu.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
